name: Slime Shoot
storyline: During the reign of the King Slime, the slime kingdom was at peace... until they were invaded! The slimes were unable to stop the attack, and the King Slime fled, leaving his people behind. The fate of the slime kingdom rests in your hands.
summary: Slime Shoot is an isometric shooter where you control a slime fighting off the bad guys who have overrun the slime kingdom. Every attempt grants coins to spend in the shop for new weapons, passives, cosmetics, and abilities.
